text: when I was crying I saw this light over
to my left and I looked over in his a
video camera and I just turned my head
back because I was like oh my gosh I
don't really know what to do right now
but I just kept trying because like I
can't just stop on command my name is
Sean Caryn and I'm a delegate for Bernie
Sanders from Minnesota so the hat that I
was wearing in the photo actually was
not a Peter Pan hat it was a Robin Hood
hat I mean you can kind of get it with
Bernie Sanders you know taking from the
top 1% to give to the bottom 99% I had
accepted that Hillary had won the
nomination and and I guess that
acceptance was kind of hollow and just
being in the moment seeing everyone
around me and hearing Bernie speak the
catharsis that happened they caught it
on camera
I think something that's really wrong
with our society is that it's so hyper
masculine that anytime a man cries
obviously look what happened to me like
they just took me as a liberal white
idealist went really like I just enjoy
his values I think better you'd be a
good president now people have seen my
face and whether they feel negative or
positive really about me I really don't
care it's just a funny thing thank you
very much
